title: Round Ireland with a Fridge
body: A Comedic book where Tony Hawk is bet a sum of one hundred pounds that he cannot hitchike around ireland with a Fridge.

title: Circe
body: A story based on one of the daughters of Helios who is rejected by her kin and isolated on a desert island where she discovers the power of Witchcraft.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
body: A Story where a young boy wins a golden ticket to a exclusive tour around a chocolate factory.
